item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started with SSL/TLSFollow the steps below to enable SSL/TLS protection for your application. ​​ Prerequisites Create an account and register an application ​​ Step 1 — Choose an edge certificate Cloudflare offers a variety of options for your application’s edge certificates: Universal certificates: By default, Cloudflare issues — and renews — free, unshared, publicly trusted SSL certificates to all Cloudflare domains. Advanced certificates: Use advanced certificates when you want something more customizable than Universal SSL but still want the convenience of SSL certificate issuance and renewal.
